titleStmt.title: A short account of what was deposed; together with the names of several of the persons, that experimented Mr. Warner's earth, and gave evidence for the King at the late tryal at barr in the Court of Exchequer, which was had by order of Their Majesties in Council, upon the petition of many hundred of clothyers, fullers, clothworkers and others relating to the wollen manufacture: the 24th. Novemb. 1693.

A short account of what was deposed; together with the names of several of the persons, that experimented Mr. Warner's earth, and gave evidence for the King at the late tryal at barr in the Court of Exchequer, which was had by order of Their Majesties in Council, upon the petition of many hundred of clothyers, fullers, clothworkers and others relating to the wollen manufacture: the 24th. Novemb. 1693.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
